local_intent: Detect white_plate, compute grasp, approach, open gripper (0.09), pick using computed grasp, verify grasp stability
assumptions: gripper calibrated and able to open to 0.09
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT steps for detecting and grasping the white plate (DetectObject → ComputeGraspPose → ApproachAndAlign → OpenGripper → Pick → verify), matching the GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION grasp phase.
